resources.string:
What is STAMINA mode?" STAMINA mode is Sony’s power save function. It extends the battery lifetime when the display is off.
"Basic usage" To turn on STAMINA mode, tap the button on the screen. When the screen is off, in order to save battery life, Wi-Fi and mobile data will be temporarily disabled, and most applications will be inactive. When the screen is on, your phone will function normally.
"Advanced usage" If you want to keep some apps active while STAMINA is on, please add the apps into the APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY list. Applications may not work correctly if they are not added to the list.
"Note" If an application doesn’t work correctly, please register the app in APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY or turn off STAMINA mode."
Low battery mode

"While tethering you cannot use the Internet on your phone. You may be able to if you choose another network. Please always check the other network's charges. Do you want to continue to tether?"

"With the current exchange settings you are required to encrypt the SD card to be able to access it.
Encryption of the SD card may take several hours depending on the storage capacity.
Encrypt now?"

"Encryption of the SD card was interrupted and cannot be completed. As a result, the data on your SD card is no longer accessible.
You need to format your SD card in order to access the data again."

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your phone.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the phone to the web.
To select what type of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts.
Data transmission charges may apply when updates are made to your phone."

Require a numeric PIN or password to decrypt your phone each time you power it on

"This will encrypt your personal data such as accounts, settings and downloaded apps. Once you encrypt your device, you must enter a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you turn it on.
Encryption may take several hours depending on the storage capacity of the device. You must start with a charged battery and keep your device plugged in until encryption is complete. During this process the device will restart several times. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data. "
Plug in your charger
You need to set a lock screen PIN or password before you can start encryption.
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. ^1% complete.

"Encryption was interrupted and can't complete. As a result, the data on your phone is no longer accessible.
To resume using your phone, you must perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you'll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Google Account. "

%1$s will be able to read all notifications posted by the system or any installed app, which may include personal information such as contact names and the text of messages sent to you. It will also be able to dismiss these notifications or touch action buttons within them.

"When this feature is turned on, you can beam app content to another NFC-capable device by holding the devices close together. For example, you can beam Browser pages, YouTube videos, People contacts, and more.
Just bring the devices together (typically back to back) and then touch your screen. The app determines what gets beamed."

"When this feature is turned on, you can zoom in and out by triple-tapping the screen.
While zoomed in, you can: "
"Pan: Drag two or more fingers across the screen. "
Adjust zoom level: Pinch two or more fingers together or spread them apart."
You can also temporarily magnify what's under your finger by triple-tapping and holding. In this magnified state, you can drag your finger to explore different parts of the screen. Lift your finger to return to your previous state.
Note: Triple-tap for magnification works everywhere except the keyboard and navigation bar."

Since data usage is measured by your phone, and your carrier may account for usage differently, consider using a conservative limit."

A trusted credential installed on your device is making this possible."

"You can share this device with other people by creating additional users. Each user has their own space, which they can customize with their own apps, wallpaper, and so on. Users can also adjust tablet settings like Wi-Fi that affect everyone.
After you create a new user, that person needs to go through a setup process.
Any user can accept updated app permissions on behalf of all other users."

"You can use your device as a Mobile Hotspot. This allows other devices (maximum 10) to connect to it via a Wi-Fi network. The connected devices will have access to the Internet via your phone’s mobile network connection. Mobile Hotspot uses mobile data and can result in additional charges.
Mobile Hotspot consumes more battery. Connect the device to an outlet to extend battery life."
Get started with Mobile Hotspot
Set up & manage portable Wi-Fi hotspot

PIN accepted

Adjust priority order

"The internal memory is already encrypted.
By turning on encryption of the SD card, new files and files that are modified will be encrypted and cannot be read in other devices. Already existing files will remain unencrypted as long as they aren't modified.
Note: it is not possible to turn off SD card encryption once it has been turned on."

"With the current Exchange settings, you are required to turn on encryption of the SD card to be able to access it.
Doing this will encrypt new files. Already existing files on the SD card will remain unencrypted until they are modified.
Encrypt now?"

"Encryption of the SD card will prevent new files from being used in other devices. Unaltered files will still be accessible in other devices until they are modified. Please note that turning on SD card encryption is irreversible.
Note: This action cannot be reversed, except by performing a factory reset, erasing all your data."

"Any changes you make to your accounts on the web will be automatically copied to your device.
Some accounts may also automatically copy any changes you make on the device to the web.
To select what type of information to sync within each account, go to Settings > Accounts.
Data transmission charges may apply when updates are made to your device. An unlimited data plan is recommended."
"Enable one or more functions in STAMINA mode to optimize battery time. "

"Activate reader mode for the applications you want to use undisturbed. When you use an application in reader mode no other applications are allowed to run. By using only one application at a time you will also save power. "
Lets you use selected applications without getting disturbed by notifications.
All encrypted files on an SD card will be unreadable in the device after a factory data reset.
Preferred connection in roaming
Search in Settings and Xperia™ online support pages. To be able to search online you must have Internet connection.
Queuing background data optimizes outgoing traffic when the screen is off by sending data at set intervals.
Note!

Power saving display mode
